reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: India Tech Clusters – Cluster connectivity budget only

description.narrative: Support to the Tech Clusters of the UK-India Tech Partnership (UKITP) programme. This programme is designed to support inward/outward missions (academic and industry focused) to build linkages - such as but not limited to, formal academic exchange between key institutions and academic guidance/investor guidance to scale-ups. As a secondary benefit, the programme will aim to increase opportunities for international business and academic institutions, including for the UK, in areas where the UK is well placed to compete.
